about_the_game:
- THE GAME -

Touhou Lensed Night Sky, Kaseigai is a nontraditional bullet hell that focuses on a fully modular loadout. The player's own attacks and special effects can be exchanged midway through runs as the situation demands, or simply for fun.

There are a lot of ways to approach the game, with three playable characters, four major difficulty options, and a myriad of challenges and difficulty-lowering options that can be enabled or disabled at will.

- TOUHOU PROJECT -

This game is a fanwork of Touhou Project, a multimedia series that takes place in a hidden country called Gensokyo. The characters and setting in this game are the same as those in the official releases. However, some time has passed for them. Maybe everyone is not exactly as you recall?

If you're not familiar with the Touhou Project series, don't worry! Touhou Lensed Night Sky, Kaseigai is relatively self-explanatory and doesn't demand additional knowledge in order to be played.

- FEATURES -

  • Over a hundred and fifty items!
  • Over a bazillion bullets!
  • A bunch of achievements!
  • A bunch of challenges!
  • At least four marketable plushies, and one absolutely unmarketable one!
  • Sixty thousand lines of code! (Most people don't care about this one)
  • Music!
  • Art!
  • Touhou!
  • And 39 bad endings uniquely written for every possible loss! Never a run wasted if there's a new dumb joke at the end!

- DEMO FEATURES -

  • Three full stages and bosses to complete!
  • Save file carries over to full game!
  • It's free! What a deal!
  • Nyohoho, you're not getting all my features just yet, buddy!

legal_notice: Touhou Project is owned by Team Shanghai Alice. This is a derivative work that conforms to the Touhou Fan Content Guidelines.
